title: Silah â€” An Intermediary Between Businesses and Suppliers
intro: Silah is a graduation project developed by a team of five students at Princess Nourah Bint Abdul Rahman University, supervised by Dr. Abeer Alarfaj. We created an AI-augmented B2B platform to improve procurement and supplier connections in Saudi Arabia.
abstract: The platform allows verified companies to engage in e-bidding, group purchasing, and multilingual product search. We applied modern web technologies, AI for demand forecasting and search, and built a fully functional site.
